overview:
Joseph, has invested in, managed, and helped guide technology businesses for over two decades. Joseph served as Vice Chairman, President and CEO of Hutchison Harbour Ring Ltd, a technology holding company listed on the Main Board of the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong (SEHK: 715). Joseph was also President and CEO of ICG Japan K.K. and Managing Director of Internet Capital Group Inc. (NASDAQ: ICGE).

During his career, Joseph has directly managed over $3 billion in technology and media related investments. Previously, Joseph served as Senior Managing Director of HQ Asia Pacific and as Senior Managing Director of Peregrine Capital.

Joseph began his career as a management consultant with McKinsey & Company and as an investment banker with The First Boston Corporation. Joseph has served as Chairman of several corporations including: MTV Japan, @ Japan Media, GPara.com, Equinox Computing, eXcelerator, Kansai BioSciences, and B2B Platforms. Joseph has served on the board of several enterprises including: Carenet.com, Food Info Mart, and Digimation Studios.

Joseph is a graduate of Harvard University (B.A.) and of Cambridge University (M.Phil.).
